name: datatransfer_transfers_insert
description: Inserts a data transfer request. See the [Transfer parameters](/admin-sdk/data-transfer/v1/parameters) reference for specific application requirements.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

DataTransfer.description: A Transfer resource represents the transfer of the ownership of user data between users.

applicationDataTransfers.description: The list of per-application data transfer resources. It contains details of the applications associated with this transfer resource, and also specifies the applications for which data transfer has to be done at the time of the transfer resource creation.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a DataTransfer request.

newOwnerUserId.description: ID of the user to whom the data is being transferred.

oldOwnerUserId.description: ID of the user whose data is being transferred.

requestTime.description: Read-only. The time at which the data transfer was requested.

ApplicationDataTransfer.description: Template to map fields of ApplicationDataTransfer resource.

applicationTransferParams.description: The transfer parameters for the application. These parameters are used to select the data which will get transferred in context of this application. For more information about the specific values available for each application, see the [Transfer parameters](/admin-sdk/data-transfer/v1/parameters) reference.

applicationTransferStatus.description: Read-only. Current status of transfer for this application.

key.description: The type of the transfer parameter, such as `PRIVACY_LEVEL`.

value.description: The value of the transfer parameter, such as `PRIVATE` or `SHARED`.

$block: A Transfer resource represents the transfer of the ownership of user data between users.

$ul: **applicationDataTransfers**: The list of per-application data transfer resources. It contains details of the applications associated with this transfer resource, and also specifies the applications for which data transfer has to be done at the time of the transfer resource creation.
**kind**: Identifies the resource as a DataTransfer request. (default: admin#datatransfer#DataTransfer)
**newOwnerUserId**: ID of the user to whom the data is being transferred.
**oldOwnerUserId**: ID of the user whose data is being transferred.
**requestTime**: Read-only. The time at which the data transfer was requested.
